title: Private communities, community roles and community admin dashboard
body:
### **User description** - Created the JoinRequest entity and added enums for community types and roles. Remember to apply migrations when testing. - Made it so that communities can be public (anyone can join) or private (users must request access to join) - Added the admin role - Made the admin dashboard for communities, accessible by admins and creators. - Added the options to promote community members to admins and to kick members out, in the admin dashboard - Also included the pending requests to approve/reject in the admin dashboard - Added the request join method and added it to the view community, only in private ones. ___ ### **Description** - Introduced `CommunityType` and `UserRole` enums to manage community types and user roles. - Added `JoinRequest` model and repository to handle join requests for private communities. - Implemented new routes and service methods for managing community join requests and admin actions. - Updated templates to reflect new community management features, including admin dashboards and join request handling. - Created migration to support new community types, roles, and join request functionalities. ___ ### **Changes walkthrough** 📝

The implemented code counts on 3 functions which allow making the download in .json, .yaml and .xml, and 1 function that manage the different routes to download them.
